what brought you to the hospital today
I was having trouble with the pain from my cancer... I just couldn't take it anymore at home.

Regina Walker, I was born January 1st . . . [Ms. Walker reports correct birth year.]

any urinary discomfort
No, there's no burning or pain there.

Let's see, I had a few bites of yogurt last night before bed... I think that was the last time I had anything.
do you have any preferences for hospice care

I want to allow things to take their course . . . it's time for me to stop fighting and just enjoy the time I have left in what little ways I can. My husband and I have chosen an assisted living residence near my home where I'll go for hospice care. I have been told that they can help me with the pain there .  . . and it's close enough that my husband can be with me.
do you have advance directive
Yes, all my affairs should be in order.
when did your pain start
I've been in some pain for a long time, but it reached an unbearable level two days ago.
where is your pain
Well, everywhere really . . . These past days I've felt it mostly in my ribs and legs but even my bones hurt.
what are the characteristics of your pain
I can feel it all over my body . . . It's a sharp pain in my bones, my legs, and my ribs. It's been getting much worse over the past two days.
any aggravating symptoms of your pain
Nothing makes the pain worse, nothing makes it better. It's just constant and relentless.
do you take any treatment for your pain
Are you taking anything for pain?.
can you rate you pain on a scale of 0-10, 0 being no pain and 10 being the worst ever
Can you rate your current pain level on a scale of 0 to 10?.
can you rate you pain on a scale of 0-10, 0 being no pain and 10 being the worst ever (Clarified to Can you rate your current pain level on a scale of 0 to 10?.)
Right now, I'm about a 4 of 10. (Clarified to how I would rate my pain on a scale.)
any allergies
Well, I don't have allergies to anything but penicillin. I told them right when I arrived.
thank you for helping answer all these questions
I appreciate the good will.
what does penicillin do to you
I'm fairly certain I just got a rash when I found out I was allergic.
do you take any medications at home
I take two types of morphine at home every day and I also manage my hypertension with Hyzaar.
do you take long acting morphine
Yes, it helps most of the time but this pain was so intense that I barely noticed any change.
do you take immediate acting morphine (No matching questions found.)
do you take immediate release  morphine
Yes, I do. It generally is effective for my pain, but it was no help for the past few days.
im sorry you have been in so much pain
Thank you. Your kindness is felt.
do you use any substances
No, I do not.
do you take any over the counter medications
All of my medications are prescription.

any gastrointestinal changes recently (Clarified to Do you have gastrointestinal problems?.)

how long have you been constipated

any psychological changes
No, not specifically . . . I have been feeling somewhat anxious lately though.
any surgical history
I had a mastectomy about 5 years ago for the cancer, and before that a hernia repair surgery.
have you had any changes in the heart area

any depression
I have my ups and downs. Nothing so down I'd call depression, though.
what is your living situation

I'm living with my husband in our home. I'm happy there still, all the familiar surroundings, visits from our friends . . . but if the pain is going to be as bad as this morning from now on, I'm not sure what I can do about it at home.
do you feel safe in your home
Of course, I've never felt threatened at home.
are you able to bath yourself
I don't bathe on my own anymore. My husband helps me, especially with getting in and out of the shower, and we have a shower bench that I sit on.
are you able to dress yourself
I don't have any trouble dressing myself.
im glad you have support at home
Thank you for saying that. Really.

Yes, I've lost 20 pounds or so in the past two months.
any effects on your social activities because of your health (Clarified to Do your health problems affect your social life?.)
Yes, it certainly does. I love that we get plenty of visitors at our house, but it's hard for me even to get up and see them sometimes. (Clarified to if my health problems affect my social life.)
do you have any past medical history
Yes, I have stage IV breast cancer and hypertension.
any family medical history
My parents both have passed on, but they had a few health issues while they were still with us. Both had high blood pressure and cholesterol and my father had type 2 diabetes as well.
what is your perception of health
I'd say my health is poor in general. I'm quite aware of the situation I'm in.
